Audience: Engineering

Purpose
-------

Scope
-----
List of scenarios and components covered by the plan.

---------------------------

---------------
- Enumerated test cases with acceptance criteria and expected results.

----------------
- Minimal steps to run in CI (containers, scripts, metrics to gather).
